channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Today Family Worship
channel.desc: Christian values are often being challenged-challenged not in the words of skeptics alone, but by the laws of this land that directly countradict the teachings of God's Word and the liberty of conscience of God's people. In these struggles of what is deemed RIGHT or WRONG, God's character is being questioned within our churches and without. We see on the horizon the fulfillment of John 9:4 where we read, ... the night cometh, when no man can work.
